title: How many pre placement tests can I miss?
content: I don't exactly remember how many we had to mandatorily write. I have missed about 5 of them.  Aptitude and Coding tests were meant to be separate but every test has both of them. Also, does the number of tests we have to write vary from department to department?

comments.body: I never wrote a single one lmao, so did a few others i know. As far as I think so, you're safe
They have told that 4 coding tests and 6 mcq tests are compulsory for placements for us lmaoo
Shylaja told our batch about them being mandatory as well. Since she hasn't bothered me since I've graduated and started working I'm going to assume it's safe lmao

Or to be on the safe side, just login to the test and then exit after like 10 mins. Will guarantee attendance for the tests. Or be a Chad and make a script to do this, put it on resume and flex to interviewers about it :vckek:
